home.title: EcoPoint
home.subtitle: Scan QR codes and find the nearest recycling points. Together we make the world cleaner!
home.binMapDesc: Find recycling bins near you on an interactive map with real-time locations
home.rankingDesc: Compare your recycling efforts with other users and compete for the top spot
home.userStatsDesc: Track your monthly and total points, unlock achievements for your eco-friendly actions
home.rewardsDesc: Redeem your earned points for exclusive offers and eco-friendly products
home.recognitionDesc: Smart technology to identify waste types and provide sorting guidance
home.wasteTrackingDesc: Track different types of waste - plastic, glass, and paper throughout your recycling journey
home.globalStatsDesc: See the collective environmental impact of all EcoPoint users worldwide
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Start making a difference in just a few simple steps
home.step1Desc: Get the EcoPoint app and create your free account
home.step2Desc: Find a smart bin and scan its QR code to unlock it
home.step3Desc: Throw your recyclables into the appropriate bin
home.step4Desc: Get rewarded with points and track your environmental impact

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: EcoPoint is an innovative platform for simplifying the waste recycling process
about.missionText: The goal of the project is to reduce waste in public spaces by motivating residents to properly dispose and segregate it. The smart bin system supports zero waste strategies and reduces negative human impact on the environment, contributing to improved quality of life in cities.
about.ecoFriendlyDesc: Reduce waste in public spaces and support zero waste strategies through smart recycling solutions
about.convenienceDesc: Build a sense of shared responsibility and promote eco-friendly attitudes. Gamification elements make recycling attractive for younger generations
about.transparencyDesc: Lower city cleaning costs, optimize waste collection, and support circular economy while enabling commercial partners to build responsible brand image
about.communityDesc: Join thousands of people who care about the environment and make cities cleaner together
